data.description:
Overview

The IT Department is seeking a motivated Artificial Intelligence (AI) Analyst Co-Op who will be based out of the O’Fallon, MO office. We are seeking a motivated AI Analyst Co-op to join our team and support the design, development, and deployment of artificial intelligence and machine learning solutions. This role offers hands-on experience working with real-world data, modern AI tools, and cross-functional teams while applying academic knowledge in a professional setting.

Responsibilities

Essential Duties and Responsibilities include the following. Other duties may be assigned.

  • Assist in developing, training, and evaluating machine learning and AI models.
  • Collect, clean, and preprocess structured and unstructured data.
  • Experimentation with algorithms such as regression, classification, clustering, NLP, or computer vision.
  • Write and maintain Python code for data analysis and model development.
  • Collaborate with software engineers and data scientists on AI-driven features.
  • Document findings, model performance, and technical processes.
  • Stay current with emerging AI/ML techniques and tools.
  • This position requires work to be performed on-site at our corporate office and does not provide for work from home offices.
  • Regular and reliable attendance in the office is required.

Qualifications

  • Full time college student, pursuing a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in business systems, computer science, information security, management information systems or similar fields required.
  • Candidate must have completed at least 30-60 college credit hours.
  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
  • Experience with Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint and other Office 365 applications.
  • Good written, oral and interpersonal communication skills.
  • Ability to balance, prioritize, and organize multiple tasks.
  • Ability to work collaboratively in teams and across organizations.
  • Microsoft SQL database and Access skills preferred.
  • Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) coursework or experience is a plus.

The duration of this co-op is May to December, Monday through Friday, 8:00am - 4:30pm.

We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer.

Company-paid background check required upon hire.
